about_the_game:
Treasure Editor:
Added the function of ‘custom treasure’, which can support to distribute the created treasures to corresponding force through player’s willing.
The properties of treasure can be able to edit.

It can be able to allot treasures to corresponding force when load in the new game.

The adjustment about treasures properties can be available in the game process.
